item.title: International Scouting for tenure-track assistant professorship in: Machine Learning, Computational Neuroscience for Social Cognition, Organization Studies
item.description:
From: 05-05-2023 12:00
To: 30-06-2023 13:00
Category: Collaborators

La Scuola IMT Alti Studi Lucca invita i candidati interessati/le candidate interessate a ricoprire il ruolo di Ricercatore Tenure Track (RTT) o Ricercatore a tempo determinato di tipo B in:


  • Computational Neuroscience for Social Cognition

  • Machine Learning

  • Organization Studies

IMT School for Advanced Studies Lucca invites interested candidates/applicants for Tenure Track Researcher (RTT) or Type B Term Researcher in:


  • Computational Neuroscience for Social Cognition

  • Machine Learning

  • Organization Studies

Maggiori informazioni (More information)

item.title: 2023 PHD CALL FOR APPLICATIONS
item.description:
From: 21-04-2023 12:00
To: 19-06-2023 23:59
Category: Dottorati

Call for applications: Ita | Eng


8 specialized tracks:


  • Analysis and Management of Cultural Heritage

  • Cognitive, Computational and Social Neurosciences

  • Economics, Analytics and Decision Sciences

  • Museum Studies

  • Computational Mechanics

  • Complex Systems and Networks

  • Learning and Control

  • Software Quality

Duration: up to 4 years


Official language of the PhD Programs: English.


Scholarships and grants:


  • 32 scholarships funded by the IMT School

Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview.


Detailed information is available in the call for applications.
